Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Total time between SW-Reviewer Declined and the subsequent occurrence of SW-Reviewer Agreed within the same case
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average duration of the period starting with SW-Reviewer Declined and ending with the next reviewer assignment activity (e.g., SW-AE Assign Reviewers)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Minimum time elapsed from SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-Reviewer Selection is now due
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'

Name: Average time it takes to perform SW-AE Assign Reviewers after SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Total resolution time of SW-Reviewer Declined measured as the interval until a new reviewer agrees (SW-Reviewer Agreed) or the process transitions to Assign a Different Editor
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Declined to Assign a Different Editor across all variants where both activities occur
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Elapsed time between SW-Reviewer Declined and SW-Reviewer No Response in cases where no further agreement is recorded
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer No Response'

Name: Time from SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants that bypass re-invitation and proceed directly to editorial decision
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total time between consecutive occurrences of SW-Reviewer Declined within the same case before a successful SW-Reviewer Agreed occurs
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average cycle time of SW-Reviewer Declined defined as the interval from its occurrence to the next non-declined reviewer outcome (e.g., SW-Reviewer Agreed or SW-Reviewer Unavailable)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time from SW-Reviewer Declined to Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1, indicating promptness of follow-up actions
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Average time between SW-Reviewer Declined and SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late in prolonged reviewer selection paths
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late'

Name: Total time from SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in variants where AE recommendation proceeds despite reviewer decline
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'
